body:
<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!-->


**What happened**:
The following e2e test failed on my local cluster.
- DynamicProvisioner [Slow] [It] should provision storage with different parameters

```
- Failure [6.240 seconds]
[sig-storage] Dynamic Provisioning
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/utils/framework.go:22
  DynamicProvisioner [Slow]
  /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/volume_provisioning.go:259
    should provision storage with different parameters [It]
    /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/volume_provisioning.go:260

    Expected
        <int>: 0
    not to equal
        <int>: 0

    /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/storage/volume_provisioning.go:1189
```
**What you expected to happen**:
My k8s node has no zone lables.
```
$ cluster/kubectl.sh describe node
Name:               127.0.0.1
Roles:              <none>
Labels:             beta.kubernetes.io/arch=amd64
                    beta.kubernetes.io/os=linux
                    kubernetes.io/arch=amd64
                    kubernetes.io/hostname=127.0.0.1
                    kubernetes.io/os=linux
```
The test tries to get zone labels by getRandomClusterZone() at first.
It fails because of getting no zone labels.

I think that it's better to skip than fail if a k8s node does not have zone labels.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"14+", GitVersion:"v1.14.0-alpha.2.359+0fdb65efa0d6c7-dirty", GitCommit:"0fdb65efa0d6c7d9ca81f6e218e97824909dc4c3", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2019-02-06T01:08:26Z", GoVersion:"go1.11.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"14+", GitVersion:"v1.14.0-alpha.2.359+0fdb65efa0d6c7-dirty", GitCommit:"0fdb65efa0d6c7d9ca81f6e218e97824909dc4c3", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2019-02-06T01:08:26Z", GoVersion:"go1.11.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: local cluster using local-up-cluster.sh
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): ubuntu 18.04.1
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): 4.15.0-43-generic
- Install tools: 
- Others:

title: "Dynamic Provisioning" e2e test failed on local cluster
